name: Casa Favilli Robusto
additionalNotes: The Mombacho Casa Favilli Robusto is a medium to full strength cigar that is handmade in Nicaragua. Its dark Nicaraguan Broadleaf wrapper covers a Nicaraguan binder and filler. This Nicaraguan puro has a peppery profile that is tempered by notes of sweetness and spice. The Casa Favilli is an excellent after dinner smoke.
